extendedInfo.description: The most thrilling running experience now comes to the yellow brick road! Reached No. 1 across the globe within hours of launch! Check out all-new China Girl, and see what critics are saying about Temple Run: Oz ââ¢ âMy favorite Temple Run game to date.â â TouchArcadeâ¢ âLush environments, a tried-and-true game mechanic, and unique new worlds and mini-games that differentiate it from other Temple Run games.â â CNETâ¢ âPrettier, faster, sleeker, and unafraid to go off the beaten path for a relaxing balloon ride.â â KotakuDisney and Imangi Studios present Temple Run: Oz â a brand-new endless runner inspired by Temple Run 2 and the film Oz the Great and Powerful. Play as Oz and outrun the shrieking flying baboons as you turn, jump and slide your way across the land. Begin your exhilarating adventure now and see how far you can run!NEW FEATURESâ¢ Run as China Girl and see Oz in different costumes â change it up!â¢ Stunning environments inspired by the film â explore them all.â¢ Fly in a hot air balloon â earn even more coins.â¢ Explore different locations in Oz â follow sign posts or use âhead startâ feature!â¢ The environment changes as you run â test your reflexes.â¢ Compete in weekly challenges & leaderboards â beat your friends!BONUS! Get 1500 coins for FREE when you download Temple Run: Oz today â thatâs $.99 USD worth of coins to buy power-ups and more!Donât forget to see Oz the Great and Powerful on DVD and Blu-ray!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: It\'s official
reviews.comment: This game of omg awesome. Love it love it love it. Can\'t put it down.
reviews.author: Malcolm McDowell

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Very cool minded its z best apps I ever play really like it.
reviews.author: Rebecca Busgeet

reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
reviews.comment: THANK U 4 this awesome game it is the best out of all the temple runs, the challenges are way better so u dont get bored of playin plus theres ldz of them aswell. this really is a must have game on ur phone u hav 2 download it trust me u wont be disappointed. The new city was well worth the wait it just adds 2 the fun and gives u evan more awesome things 2 do :-) I \342\231\245 it so much!!!!!
reviews.author: leanne gavin

reviews.title: Awesome just awesome !!!
reviews.comment: The most amazing game; great job Disney, definitely can\'t wait for thenext one-:) :) ;)
reviews.author: Hector Rosa

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The game\'s good, but I have to activate Hd Assets every time I run the game, on the Galaxy S4. Other than that, it has great colorful graphics and awesome gameplay. More worlds would make it even better, but I may be asking too much.
reviews.author: Cassio Contursi

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: After the last update I can\'t install this game on my android. It says \"couldn\'t install on SD card or USB\" but I played this game before and other games like sleep walker and tap the frog run smoothly like before, even those both games don\'t run without MMC.  Thanks
reviews.author: Akram Hasan Sharkar

reviews.title: Works fine now
reviews.comment: Great game!
reviews.author: Justin O\'Toole

reviews.title: CANNOT DOWNLOAD
reviews.comment: Please fix this or return the payment. PACKAGE FILE IS INVALID.
reviews.author: Krishelle Velasco

reviews.title: Bug.
reviews.comment: Can\'t play now. Only get a black screen. Force close doesn\'t help. Galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: James Warren

reviews.title: Bugs! Bugs! Bugs!
reviews.comment: After latest update, once the Imangi Studios is done loading, all I see is a black screen. Waited long to see if, possibly, it is still loading...to no avail. Game is basically unplayable.
reviews.author: Francis Mayo

reviews.title: Best ever
reviews.comment: Common guys... you built such an awesome game\'but why no updating the screenshots on play store??
reviews.author: Amol Gupta

reviews.title: Half star
reviews.comment: It won\'t download the new city. It just goes back to the home screen. Warning do not download until they fix the game
reviews.author: Raquel Roiz

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This game is so fun. It has 3 different places to run in. It would be better if you could change the person you ran with.
reviews.author: Halcy Clinton

reviews.title: Black Screen of death.tsk. 5 down to 1
reviews.comment: Bloody awesome runner game, buts there\'s some kind of bug which when Oz (me) smashes into a wall, tree or stone, he just dissapears. Not sure if that IS it or a bug, but it does not stop me from giving this game 5 stars. The new update DeservEs 1 star or less because it just gave me the black screen of death after the Imangi Studios Logo..poor
reviews.author: Kristoffer Jan Sobremente

reviews.title: Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Love it very addictive. Watch out you don\'t hit the home button though...
reviews.author: Thomas Twyford

reviews.title: Paisa vasool....
reviews.comment: This game is far better than all other running craps....even temple run 2 or brave....its highly addictive....simply best....worth purchasing...total PAISA VASOOL BOSS!!!!
reviews.author: Gaurav Mishra

reviews.title: Great Graphics!!!
reviews.comment: It has great multimedia experience. Runs very smoothly on my Micromax A116. Upgraded to HD version of the game, still no freezing. Please add exit button.
reviews.author: Deepak Kapoor

reviews.title: Keeps you interested...
reviews.comment: Great graphics. Challenging...and wanting more cities to play in.
reviews.author: Gen Vlahos

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s4
reviews.comment: I am getting black screen after this download and said problem with your download please try later
reviews.author: purushotham reddy dharmavaram

reviews.title: Impossible to get support. Disney/ Imangi
reviews.comment: There support is awful. They will give you the run around and ask all kinds of questions that has nothing to do with what I am asking! All I wanted was to download the rest of temple run oz  and find out why I couldn\'t  emerald city etc... If you buy from disney/Imangi and you have a problem you will not get the help you need. .USE CAUTION.
reviews.author: Rod Jones
